description: This file defines a React functional component named NoteEditor, which provides a user interface for editing the title and content of a note. It handles state management for the note's fields, manages focus when the note changes, and provides callbacks for saving, deleting, or canceling edits. The component utilizes React hooks and TypeScript types for props and references.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React functional component for editing a note's title and content, with save, delete, and cancel actions.
